Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Joke \Joke\, v. t. [imp. & p. p. {Joked}; p. pr. & vb. n. {Joking}.] To make merry with; to make jokes upon; to rally; to banter; as, to joke a comrade. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
joking \joking\ adj. intended as a joke; -- of communications.
Syn: jesting, jocose, jocular, jocund. [WordNet 1.5 +PJC]
{no joking matter} a serious matter. [PJC]
joking adj : characterized by jokes and good humor [syn: {jesting}, {jocose}, {jocular}]
